docs.lead_paragraph: IT is presupposed that no one attempts to embroider who cannot sew with ordinary skill. Therefore she has learned to handle her needle, to un- derstand stitch direction,and has acquired a delicate touch.

headline.main: Art of Embroidery Depends Much on a Knowledge of the Needle's Use -Simple Stitches Secret of Best Work.; The Outline Stitch. GETTING THE BEST IN LIFE. The Thanksgiving Feast. The Wedding Invitation. Wedding Invitation.
